text: Alloh ʙaroi hec kas du dil dar darunas qaror nadodaast. Va Alloh hec goh zanonatonro, ki ʙo zihor modari xud mexoned, modaronaton qaror nadod va pisarxondagonatonro farzandaton nasoxt, zero in du amal hec goh dar tahrimi aʙadi haqiqat suda nametavonad. Inho suxanonest, ki az haqiqat ʙerun ast, ʙa zaʙon megued. Va Alloh haq megujad va Ust, ki ʙaroi ʙandagonas roh menamojad
